name: BAT TRANG CERAMIC VILLAGE & HOME HOSTED BY VESPA
description:
The excursion is a wonderful combination of exploring the
energy of Bat Trang ceramic village and
enjoying our local Vietnamese hospitality. By 5 hours
riding on our vintage Vespa, you will pass the noisy and bustling streets
before embark to the local ferry and see the peaceful life of the Red river.
The first highlight of tour coming when you take a short walk through some
narrow alleys of Bat Trang ceramic village, visit our local communal house, see
the artisans make the pottery and ancient kilns. You also have chance to
explore the ceramic market and learn how to make a vase or cup. After having a
full experience in our ceramic village, you continue on your Vespa through
villages and fruit field. Another highlight of tour will give you a chance to
see the real life of a Vietnamese family (four generations living together).
Our home host will welcome you and happy to show you about their family, the
customs and tradition. By a sincerely invitation from the host, surely you will
stay and enjoy a cozy meal before return to your hotel.
